deleteEventConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{eventName}}" event? This action cannot be undone.
eventDeletedSuccess: The event has been successfully deleted.
eventDeleteError: Failed to delete the event. Please try again.
noEventsMatchingFilters: There are no events matching your filters.
